name: Hedgie's Last Strawberry
description:
Help Hedgie get the last strawberry home! Solve puzzles, push crates and barrels, traverse water and mud, disturb the sleep of innocent moles, and get Hedgie and their strawberry home safe!

All art, code, music, and levels were made from April 2nd - April 13th for Hedgejam 5 with the theme of "You only have one"

This game is dedicated to my favorite person, who's birthday is on the day the jam ends, April 16th. Without her support I probably couldn't have finished <3
